name: Audica: Nicki Minaj - "Starships"
summary: Add “Starships” by Nicki Minaj to your AUDICA song library.

name: Autocross Madness
summary:
Time to tour the world!
Drive trough beautiful landscapes and go mad into curves or just be a Sunday driver.
Challenge yourself in driving like a mad man as you try to get to the finish line as fast as possible.

name: Aurrery
summary:
AURRERY - 3D music creation software. 
 
Aurrery is a unique digital audio workstation which allows the user to create real 3D music using a 3D model of the solar system (an audio orrery). 
 
FEATURES: 
Load or record your own sounds or loops into each of the planets. 
Control planet rotation behaviour and speed. 
Move between your music creations in first person view or select and control a second listener globe in 3D space. 
DSP effects for each planet -low/high pass filter, chorus, reverb, distortion, delay. 
3D settings - doppler effect, min/max distance, spread. 
Supports mono, stereo, Quad, Surround, 5.1 and 7.1 output. 
configurable DSP settings and sample rates. 
Record your live performance to wav. 
Create multiple projects and save/load files. 
Global mixing panel displaying VU meters for each planet audio channel. 
Hide menus and orrery frame for real time cosmic AV performance. 
Output 2nd monitor for performance, whilst using UI on 1st monitor. Export screenshots. 
VR support - Realistic oculus VR HTRF audio spatialisation. 
PC and Mac versions.

name: Autumn
summary:
More than a game, Autumn is a relaxing place for spiritual learning and growth with a soothing atmosphere.

In each game you play as a Spirit which depends on the natural world for its progress in life. As you help the world around you to thrive, you receive vital energy(Prana) in return. During the Autumn season, while the trees are shedding their leaves, orbs of Prana are released into the air, which you can absorb. Your own Prana can be utilized to help and change the world around you and to obtain spiritual teachings.

More than levels, puzzles or in-game progressions, Autumn’s focus is on the growth of the player. Not the one in the game, but the one in the chair.

There are no time limits, no enemies to defeat, no goals to reach… except the ones you set for yourself. Relax, learn, grow… and enjoy Autumn.

name: Audition Online
summary:
Audition Online, is a downloadable multiplayer online casual rhythm game produced by T3 Entertainment. It was originally released in South Korea in 2004, but it has been localized by various publishers around the world. Audition Online is free to play but it earns its revenue by selling virtual items such as clothes for the player's avatar.

It is a major hit in Indonesia and Vietnam.

name: Audio Party Pack
summary: A party game designed around sound. Includes 3 mini-games featuring "sound" focused gameplay!This party game is designed with visual impairments in mind as it relies strongly on sound. There are three mini-games, each focusing on a different challenge.

name: Autumn Rail
summary: A survival horror visual novel. When her train terminates at the strange and sinister Sylvan Station, Tera finds herself entangled in a neverending night of darkness.

name: Autonomous Odyssey
summary: Autonomous Odyssey is a story-driven, hand-drawn 2D metroidvania. Use agile platforming on your apocalyptic sci-fi journey to explore the labs once filled with exceptional researchers. Fight through vengeful robots on Pim’s quest to find his missing father and restore everyone's humanity.

name: Auditorium
summary: In Auditorium, the player uses various game mechanics to bend streams of light particles to fill audio containers. As each of the audio containers is filled, an audio channel introducing an instrument or sound is added to the game's music. In most levels, the audio containers are a variety of colors which the particle stream must match in order to fill it. The player changes the color of the stream by manipulating it over fixed areas of the level which dye the particles as they pass through them. The goal of each level is to direct and split the stream in such a way that each audio container is filled simultaneously, revealing the level's full soundtrack.

name: Australian Idol Sing
summary: Australian Idol Sing is a single and multiplayer singing game. In real karaoke style, songs appear on your screen and you have to sing the right words at the right time. Onscreen indicators inform you what pitch you need to maintain at any given time. Hit the right notes for the right amount of time, and you'll get high scores.

name: Automobilista 2: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya
summary: Circuit de Barcelona Catalunya has arrived for AMS2, featuring both recent Grand Prix layouts.

name: Aunt Arctic Adventure
summary: Aunt Arctic Adventure plots you, Charlie the Chimp, and your friend Penguin Pete against Big Borus, the circus owner who has kidnapped your Aunt and forced her to work as a circus performer in the Arctic. In order to save your Aunt from this chilling, frightful scenario, you and your friend must negotiate 50 intricate, extensive levels of mentally challenging, surprise filled, action packed adventure. Along the way you will encounter hostile Eskimos, nasty penguins, and countless other types of diabolic creatures whose only interest is to stop you dead in your tracks before you can rescue your Aunt.

name: Aurora Polaris
summary: Aurora Polaris is a vertical shoot 'em up set in a post-pandemic future where a mysterious old engineer brings together four unlikely pilots to stop a technocratic regime known as NOX. Blending arcade action, anime-inspired visuals, and heartfelt narrative, players engage in intense boss fights, upgrade their ships, and explore handcrafted stages across a frozen Earth. Featuring local co-op, emotional cutscenes, and a unique sci-fi take on holiday mythology.

name: Aura Kingdom
summary:
Aura Kingdom takes place in an anime-styled vast world rendered with detailed graphics. The game consists of primarily open world with instances that can either be partaken as solo or in a party. Players can choose between a variety of classes, with ten classes released and an upcoming one, as of May 2014. The players can freely customize their character or avatar with many choices of hair styles and faces and much more. It is then proceeded with the choice of four Eidolons, who will accompany the player throughout the game, while also giving the ability to earn other Eidolons.
Within the game, the player can interact with many non-player characters and enter combat mode with monsters outside of the hub world. The combat system is primarily the player using a wide variety of skills corresponding with the class against the monsters, who also have their own set of skills. The majority of the game is to simply attack and defeat the monsters along the way while partaking quests. The combat system is unique in a way that, although the player has to click on a monster to engage in combat, the player also has the ability to move to dodge and use their skills in a variety of ways. With an accompanying Eidolon, the player's Eidolon can also fight alongside their character, and also use a combination attack. The combat system is not merely a "click-and-watch" combat. Outside of the combat system, the player can also engage in several different tasks, such as fishing, crafting, and many more.

While the game is situated in a free-to-play environment, the game also allows the players to purchase Aeria Points, or for short AP, that allows the players to use that monetary value for special in-game items found in the Item Mall. Otherwise, the game uses the gold and silver tactic, which can be acquired a number of ways. The game also allows the use of trade, a self-installed stall in Navea, and the Auction House. Players can also use the mailing system to mail other players using the cash-on-delivery system.

name: Autumn Dynasty Warlords
summary:
Revered, feared and enigmatic. The First Autumn Emperor’s legacy is undisputed. He began as a minor warlord, yet he would one day unify the country, discover firedust, and repel the greatest barbarian invasion in history. His personage is a mystery, but his exploits are legendary. Could you have ruled in his place instead?
Manage your empire turn by turn: manage cities, construct buildings, raise armies and engage in diplomacy and espionage. Unify the land by conquering all provinces!
Fight your battles in real time: use simple gestures to direct your armies and turn the tide of battle with special abilities. Outsmart and outmaneuver your foes through superior tactics!

name: Aure
summary: Aure is an open world exploration RPG where you take a role of an adventurer in a large and living fantasy world.

name: Autumn Park Mini Golf
summary: Autumn Park Mini Golf is a first person miniature golf game set in a scenic park. With smooth jazz and piano sets to help set the mood, we think you'll enjoy your time relaxing and exploring the park while you play. Can you finish the game under par?

name: Augmented AR Jungle Adventure
summary: Augmented AR Jungle Adventure is a hidden object and FPS Shooter style 3D virtual mystery game that allows the player to move through a unique virtual environment while trying to uncover the mysteries of a hidden temple!

name: Au
summary: A shoot 'em up arcade game in a similar style to Bosconian and Xevious that was planned for release in late 1983, though despite location testing, the game never released. Was later found and dumped to MAME.

name: Audio Drive 2 VR
summary: Drive through music in a fast paced environment!

name: Auto Factory
summary:
Auto Factory lets you build your very own assembly line out of a range of blocks such as Conveyors, Filters and Cannons. Then, turn common materials from one thing into another using machines such as Crushers, Shredders and Furnaces. Put these materials together to make products which you can sell for PROFIT! Complete orders to make money and unlock new recipes.

Do you have what it takes to run your own automated factory and make cold hard cash!

name: Automobilista 2: Supercars Pack Pt1
summary: Supercars Pt1 brings road legal performance for Automobilista 2, with the Corvette C8 Z06, the Mclaren Senna and the Brabham BT62.

name: Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan
summary: Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG game that is introducing a new, rarely seen perspective to this genre. The dynamic and impressive gameplay has been more inspired by the "Tales of" series. The main narrative draws deeply from African culture and is hopefully the first entry in a series call The Kiro’o Tales.

name: Autos
summary: Autos is driving game contains five modes Racing, Car Park Drift, Truck Challenge, Rally and Transportation Open World Driving.

name: Aussie Rules Evolution 2
summary: No licensed teams just pure fun and great gameplay! Jam packed with the thrills and spills of the Aussie Rules game.

name: Audica: The Weeknd - "Can't Feel My Face"
summary: Add “Can't Feel My Face” by The Weeknd to your AUDICA song library.

name: Automate Defend Repeat
summary: Automate, Defend, Repeat: a cosmic game of factory management and tower defense strategy. Build a planet-dominating factory, defend it from disgruntled elementals, and upgrade until the locals hand over the keys to their world. Once you've claimed one planet, launch off to colonize the next!

name: Autobahn Raser
summary:
Autobahn Raser is the second release in Davilex's Racer series and the first in the Autobahn Raser series. While their previous game A2 Racer took place on the Dutch A2 highway this one is set to the German Autobahn.

You'll participate in various races across various parts of the German Autobahn and connected cities.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 2: Switch Edition
summary: An exciting career awaits you In Autobahn Police Simulator 2 for Nintendo Switch. Patrolling the German autobahns – arguably Europe’s busiest roads- is not for the fainthearted as you battle to maintain speed restrictions, track down drugs traffickers and manage road traffic incidents.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3: Speed Trap
summary: Choose tactical positions along the Autobahn, monitor traffic discreetly, and gather solid evidence of speeding violations with the new speed trap!

name: Autumn's Dungeoneering
summary: You're the expendable summoned pet. Your AI adventurer calls the shots while you try to keep them alive. You respawn when you die, they don't. Classic RPG mechanics with a completely flipped power dynamic.

name: Aurum
summary: Aurum is a roguelike deck building storefront simulator. Draft the goods you sell, arrange them to maximize their value, and counter the negative effects of problem customers. Combo your cards together to create the best store and earn as much as you can to stay open!

name: Auralux: Constellations
summary: Auralux: Constellations is the awaited sequel to Auralux, the critically acclaimed minimalistic Real Time Strategy game. Explore a dozen new gameplay mechanics through each constellation, one new feature at a time. It's Real-­Time Strategy, deconstructed.

name: Autumn's Journey
summary:
The world of Ishtera is populated by two races: dragonkind, who have lived there for eons, and the heavenkind, who have recently appeared.

Auralee, an aspiring knight from the farming town of Berri, stumbles upon something unexpected during one of her patrols. After a rather inelegant introduction, Kerr states he's really an Earth Dragon. Whether he likes it or not, Auralee is now involved in his mission to regain his dragon form. Along with some help by a fellow dragonkind named Ilmari, their journey begins...

name: Automata Streetcar
summary: An interactive, digital-media art project that uses historic streetcars as a metaphor to explore ideas about connection, communication, and community. Primarily intended for gallery / museum installations - or you can build your own Arduino-based controllers to play at home!

name: Autonomica
summary: Autonomica is an open-world survival game playable solo or with friends inspired by solarpunk aesthetics, driven by farming, automation, exploration, and futuristic tech. Build automated farms, craft advanced machines, and explore islands filled with mysteries, strange phenomena, and time-bending challenges.

name: August Walk
summary: The game has three story branches: normal, realistic, and mystical walk. In the normal branch you can just walk around the summer city, the forest and the spring.

name: Aurora Trail
summary: A new epic game where the perspective of the camera changes everything. Do not let your body parts get in the same view as a wall with the same color, or you’ll lose it! Puzzle your way through challenging and appealing surroundings and try to stay in one piece!

name: Automation: The Car Company Tycoon Game
summary: Make your dream cars a reality with Automation’s unparalleled car and engine design tools. Gain a competitive edge through smart engineering and business decisions to help you build an automotive empire. Will you become an industry leader, or just a footnote in automotive history?

name: Auto Brawl Chess
summary: Auto Brawl Chess is a balanced blend of Auto Chess, Idle RPG, and CCG mechanics given form on an epic battlefield! Build your unique band of heroes, level them up, and set out on a thrilling Journey into the mythical world of Pangea waiting to be saved!

name: Autumn war
summary: Command your troops in a desperate last stand against the walking dead.

name: Autumn's Bounty
summary: Find your friends, save your potluck.

name: Aubirdforce After

name: Aurora's Journey and the Pitiful Lackey
summary: Join Aurora and the Lackey in this side-scrolling game with shooter mechanics, adventures, various mini-games and 3D graphics. In 1927, Aurora, a young astronomer, receives the journal of her father who disappeared four years earlier and embarks on a journey to find him.

name: Audica: James Landino - "Funky Computer"

name: Audio Clash: Battle of the Bands
summary: Create a band and dominate the competition in this new music-themed auto-battler developed by Big Boat Interactive in conjunction with The Living Tombstone. Take part in 8-player battles and unleash your abilities to win and earn rewards. AudioClash features all members of The Living Tombstone!

name: Aurora: The Lost Medallion - The Cave
summary: Aurora – The lost medallion is a 2D, hand drawn, sci-fi, fantasy, point & click adventure game. In short, it is a family space adventure, about a girl's quest to find her identity. Inspired by old classics of the genre, the game blends comedy and drama to form a story that challenges your brain and teases your heart.

name: Automobilista 2: Historical Track Pack Pt3

name: Autogun Heroes: Supercharged
summary: Blast through alien-infested planets and help Gus assemble a team of powerful heroes to save the galaxy. This challenging shoot 'em up 2D action platformer combines brutal chaos with smooth, responsive controls. Dodge. Roll. Dominate!

Question everything you see and trust nothing you hear.
Each footstep taken, every mile flown, and all doorways entered reveal more to discover in Automaton Lung.

name: Automatic Kingdom
summary: Build the perfect kingdom in this turn-based city builder, arranging synergies of Citizens and Constructions to generate valuable resources. Keep your kingdom happy, endure hostile Challenges, and unlock new cards as your kingdom becomes more prosperous.

name: Auto Adventures
summary: Battle monsters, learn skills, collect items and trade with merchants to make the strongest hero and come out on top in asynchronous PVP auto-battles.

summary: Explore Russia as Gabriela, Gav and Mikhail. Fight Igor, Anastasia and bring back balance to the West Siberian Plain in this immersive 2D turn-based RPG experience.

summary: Get unprecedented access to the very center of tennis action, the Rod Laver Arena.

name: Aureole: Wings of Hope
summary: At sonic speeds, Aureole: Wings of Hope takes platforming to the literal skies! Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.

name: Audica: Sia ft. Kendrick Lamar - "The Greatest"
summary: Add “The Greatest” by Sia ft. Kendrick Lamar to your AUDICA song library.

name: Automobilista 2: Lamborghini Dream Pack Pt1
summary: This first part features the Lamborghi SC63, which made its debut in both IMSA and the Le Mans 24h this year, running in the GTP and LMDh classes respectively winning the hearts of fans with its stunning looks and beautiful roar.

name: Autothysis
summary: Autothysis is a first-person tower defense game where strategy meets precision. Deploy turrets, manage resources, and fight swarms of insectoid enemies. Target weak points to shatter foes while upgrading defenses to survive escalating waves. Can you withstand the oncoming horde?

name: Aura
summary: Restore the cosmos. In this immersive RPG adventure for PC and VR, wield magic and steel to heal corrupted goddesses, dragons, demons, and fae. Journey through a shattered universe and uncover the mystery behind its destruction—your destiny is to bring it back to life.

name: Automount
summary: We're in the progress of outsourcing the playing of our games to save player nerves, witness the process!

name: Aurora
summary: 《Aurora》 is a sci-fi FPS game in which you and Ano will gradually explore your memories, using guns, dark powers, and wits to deal with threats or open the way forward, and finally find a reason to move forward.

name: Audica: Simaniac - “Stook (Audica Remix)”
summary: Add “Stook (Audica Mix)” by Simaniac to your AUDICA song library.

name: Auxin
summary: Swing your liana, plant and throw seeds in Auxin! Local and online multiplayer fun featuring intenses versus matches in 4 modes, for up to 4 players. Swing into action!

name: Audica: Panic! At The Disco - "High Hopes"
summary: Add “High Hopes” by Panic! At The Disco to your AUDICA song library.

name: Audioship
summary: Audioship is a music-adapting Top-Down Shooter where you use your own music to create your own experience. The bullets, the enemies and the mood of each game is determined by the song you choose. Play solo or with up to 4 in local-multiplayer and reach the highest score.

name: Audica: asms - "Methane Breather"
summary: Add “Methane Breather” by asms to your AUDICA song library.

name: Augment Anthem
summary: Battle deadly enemies and bosses, unlock alien technology, bring humanity back from the brink in this retro style open world platformer!

name: Auto Afterlife
summary: Auto Afterlife is an an Existential Horror Car Dating Sim.

name: Automatachef
summary:
Welcome to Automachef, a resource management puzzler where you design kitchens, program machinery and watch your genius come to life! It’s time to engineer tomorrow’s kitchen, today!

Plan. Position. Program: Design and build automated restaurants, then program them to run like well-oiled machines! Do you have a can-do attitude and the know-how to conquer the world of automated restaurants?

name: Autotag
summary: Embark on a heart-pounding adventure in Autotag, where classic tag meets a twist of mayhem! Armed with powerful weapons, outsmart opponents in the destructible arena, and prove your skills in intense online multiplayer battles. Are you ready for the ultimate game of tag?

name: Automobilista 2: Nürburgring 2025
summary:
The most challenging race track in the world has received a complete overhaul! Nürburgring 2025 DLC for AMS2 is the most accurate and immersive version of the track you will find in any racing simulator.

This DLC includes the Grand Prix layout, the Nordschleife, or "North Loop" - the famous 20.8km "Green Hell" through the Eifel Forest and the 24h layout that combines the GP track with the Nordschleife, completely up to date wit the latest renovations done to the circuit earlier on the year.

name: Audica: Flo Rida ft. Sage the Gemini and Lookas - "GDFR"
summary: Add “GDFR” by Flo Rida ft. Sage The Gemini and Lookas to your AUDICA song library.

name: Autumn Hike
summary: Prepare to be captivated by the magic of nature as you embark on an unforgettable autumn journey. Are you ready to experience the beauty and serenity of the autumn forest in Autumn Hike? Lace up your boots and step into the adventure today!

name: Aussie Bogan Hero
summary: G’day mates! In this crackin’ 2D metroidvania, Aussie Bogan Hero sees Davo, a mullet-wearing, beer-loving legend, battle corporate goons and freaky creatures to reopen his pub and save Dusty Springs. 'Cause sometimes, it takes a legend in a singlet to save the day.

name: Autumn War: Survivor
summary: A stranded soldier in a hopeless last stand against the undead.

name: Aurora Light Pony: Ponies and Horses in the Valley of Stars
summary: In the Valley of Shining Stars, magic lights up every corner and guides ponies in the discovery of their true destiny.

name: Audioglide
summary: A rhythm-based music game where you import your own tracks to generate unique, dynamic roads. Collect notes in sync with the beat, dodge obstacles, and experience dazzling visuals.

name: Auto Dungeon
summary: Conquer the Astral Plane, Summoner! In this roguelite autobattler, build a powerful army in a vast, procedurally generated world. Collect cards, defeat foes and rival summoners, and equip, enchant, and mutate your creatures. Defeat the five champions and recover your stolen rings!

name: Autoduel
summary:
A futuristic, fast paced strategy role-playing game by Lord British and Chuckles.

Enter the world of tomorrow, a world of futuristic freeways where the right of way goes to the biggest gun. Somewhere within the 16 cities and outlaw-infested highways of Auto Duel, are the clues you will need to compete the ultimate mission.

Do you have the tactical skills and hair-trigger reactions required of an Auto Duellist? Prove yourself. Step into the arena on Amateur night. Only your driving proficiency and marksmanship can earn you the right to custom build your combat vehicles.

The AADA (American AutoDuel Association) will offer you courier missions for prestige, for money. The FBI and the Underworld will vie for favors, but watch out! You'll quickly realize you need a clone to survive. The final gauntlet will test your AutoDuellist skills.

The challenge of AutoDuel awaits you. Are you ready?

name: Auto Drive
summary: Top-down racing with armed cars. Upgrade performance, attach weapons and customize the visuals of your car. Build a huge parking lot and let your vehicle fleet grow.

name: Autobahn Racing
summary: No limits, no rules: 300 km/h on German autobahns and through authentic cities. Brutal street races, dense traffic, cops on your tail – pure adrenaline rush from Munich to Berlin.

name: Audica: OneRepublic - "Counting Stars"
summary: Add “Counting Stars” by OneRepublic to your AUDICA song library.

name: Au Sable
summary: The spiritual successor to All Of Our Friends Are Dead. Au Sable is a dark adventure into the ruins of a forgotten city. You are a young woman in search of someone or something that has been swallowed up by tremendous and horrible beings. As you progress, the world descends deeper and deeper into confusion, guilt, and nightmarish hell. Alone but for a mysterious masked man who speaks in cryptic message, you must survive your way to Harmonia. Only then can the eyes behold the truth.

name: Aurora Flight
summary: Aurora Flight is an air combat simulation on the uncharted planet Zenoa. Realistic altitude and speed physics provide strategic depth, while flexible fighter customization shapes your approach. Experience diverse aerial battles.

name: Autarkis
summary: A hard to master survival strategy game. Build an balance up to three colonies at once, mine ressources, manage energy and survive until you build up a 6 stage rocket to flee with your 100 settlers.This game is hard to master, prepare to fail!

name: Au Revoir
summary: Use your investigative skills in this point-and-click adventure to retrieve human minds stored in synthetic brains in 2071. Immerse yourself in a retro-futuristic world with neon-noir graphics from the 90s, and uncover a conspiracy that will challenge everything you know.

name: August Night
summary: Experience the oppressing and unsettling atmosphere of an interactive nightmare.

name: AutoBlobber
summary: AutoBlobber is a Roguelike Autobattler where you customize your Blob to survive endless waves of enemies. Strategically place upgrades, forge powerful synergies, and adapt your build between waves to push your run as far as possible.

name: Austerlitz
summary: Play as either Emperor Napoleon or Czar Alexander and re-fight the decisive battle of Austerlitz

name: Aurore: Five Princes
summary:
"We were in our own little world, the world of the fae, and all of the danger that entailed." 
 
Five Princes is a Renpy dating sim visual novel about witches, werewolves, vampires and other fantasy races. 
 
You play as Daphne (customizable name) Marshall, a normal teenage girl. On the eve on your eighteenth birthday, you discover that not only are you a witch, you are the new empress of the fae. 
 
But danger lies in wait, and you have only a few short weeks to master your power and defend your empire. 
 
Features: 
• Six romance options (five male, one female) 
• Choice to turn adult content on and off 
• Partial voice acting 
• Unlockable polyamorous relationship 
• ~12 endings 
• 60 CGs 
• Hidden romance option 
• ~126, 000 words

name: Autumn Isle
summary: A peaceful island experience

name: Aurora Dawn Poet
summary: AURORA [DAWN POET] is a narrative adventure where you play as the writer Federico García Lorca on his journey through New York City, writing Poet in New York. Explore, solve puzzles and immerse yourself in the duality of the tail end of 1920s—the last signs of the looming Depression.

name: Audica: Zedd, Maren Morris & Grey - "The Middle"
summary: Add “The Middle” by Zedd, Maren Morris & Grey to your AUDICA song library.

name: Augma II Arc I
summary:
There was once a world devoid of any color, drowned out by the sound of howling winds and the sight of an ashen metropolis, now rotting within a God's terrible dream. While attempting to speak to a figure bathed in the color Gold, a colorless figure ultimately lost their head in such a futile attempt. 
 
As the relentless passage of time sways the voices of the distant past, Shira Yamano finds himself in that ashen metropolis. Kirron, an endless valley of skyscrapers that pierce the sky, is home to where that once colorless figure would encounter various people that would bring the color back to his vision, and help him overcome his dangerous apathetic feelings. 
 
However in the process of doing so, he accidentally involves himself within a string of events that raises more questions than answers. This is the first installment of the Augma series, where white shall be tarnished before all to see.

name: Auto Legends
summary:
Auto Legends is forged from the passion of car culture.

Immerse yourself in an authentic automotive experience where high stakes pink slip racing meets endless customization. Race and tune your car with real-world performance and visual options, creating the perfect ride that expresses your unique style.

Connect with fellow enthusiasts in an automotive social network. Challenge friends and rivals, join exhilarating car meets, and proudly showcase your latest build. Take your passion to the next level by creating parts, tuning rides, organizing events, or buying and selling cars to become a true tycoon in the car world.

Auto Legends offers multiple paths to greatness. Whatever route you choose, your legend begins here.

Unleash your inner car enthusiast with Auto Legends!

name: Auger;Zenith
summary: Auger;Zenith is a limit-removing project brought to you by the Doomer Boards planet hackers. Auger;Zenith is also the ultimate cyberpunk doom project.

name: Aurora: Oasis Adventure
summary: Aurora : Oasis Adventure is an action-adventure game for the Playdate !

name: Autocard: Your RPG Adventure
summary: Autocard is a card game, it's an Autobattler with Deckbuilder, Roguelike and RPG elements. Build a powerful board, unleash insane combos, and climb from zero to hero in under an hour!

name: Automakhan
summary: The original instant real-time strategy game for the web.

name: Automatic RP‪G
summary:
Automatic RPG is the RPG where you can let your Heroes do their own thing. Why? Well, because in this game, Heroes level up and earn EXP all by themselves! 
 
All you have to do is spurn them along from time to time and watch them grow into full-fledged Heroes!

name: Automobile Tycoon
summary: Car manufacturing company simulator. Turn based, fast paced, covers 100 years of automotive history.

name: Autonomous Gods
summary: Autonomous Gods is set in a post-war AI dystopian future, where humans toil daily in the AI city of Arcadia. Powerful humans are drawn from a pool of cards to become gladiators in The Battle of Munera. Winners are immortalized and allowed to transcend the barriers of humanity and become an Azeka.

name: Austin Powers: Oh, Behave!
summary: Fans of AUSTIN POWERS will find a lot to do in AUSTIN POWERS: Oh Behave! This game turns your Game Boy Color into a mini-organizer, complete with a word processor (Austin's Pad), a calculator (the Shagulator), and a mockup web browser that contains facts about the popular movies. Looking for something a bit more game-related? Well, AUSTIN POWERS has those in spades, too! The largest of the games, "International Man in a Platform Game," is just what it sounds like. In it you play as Austin through a multitude of platform levels that feature full-color graphics inspired by the movie. Also available for your enjoyment are the "Mojo Maze," a takeoff on PAC-MAN, "Domination," a board game similar to OTHELLO, and finally "Rock or Paper or Scissors," which pits you against an Austin Powers villain in a play of the classic game. Customize the backdrop of all the fun by choosing wallpaper, screensavers, sound effects, and more. You can also link up to play some of the games with a friend or foe using either AUSTIN POWERS: Oh Behave! or AUSTIN POWERS: Welcome to My Underground Lair.

name: Automobilista 2: Monza Pack
summary: The Autodromo Nazionale Monza has arrived for Automobilista 2 - with the modern track of this supremely fast circuit and the 1971 and 1991 historical variants included.

name: Auto Balls
summary: Auto Balls is a chaotic, online auto-battler where you smash balls into each other! Build and upgrade your squad and face other players' squads in the arena! Can you adapt fast enough to survive and win 8 rounds?

name: Auto Dealership Tycoon
summary:
Welcome to Auto Dealership Tycoon, own and operate your own car dealership.

Watch your Customer Satisfaction Rating, if it sinks too low customers will stop coming!

Special customers will visit your Dealership on occasion! Sometimes good, sometimes bad.

Customer Satisfaction Rating
Used Car Auctions
Trade-ins
Buy Competing Dealerships
Weather
35+ Improvements
5 Buildings
8 Brands
25 Cars
Adjustable Pricing
Random Events

name: Augmented Empire
summary: Step into New Savannah, 2058. The acclaimed VR title Augmented Empire now debuts on PC. Command a ragtag team of misfits through 26 missions of turn-based, tactical battles. Overthrow a corrupt elite in a cyberpunk world brimming with strategy and rich storytelling.

name: AutoMaker
summary: AutoMaker is an automotive business simulator. Start at the dawn of the automotive history, build your factory, research technologies and design cars as you progress through the ages to the current era and beyond.

name: Audica: Billie Eilish - "Bad Guy"
summary: Add "bad guy" by Billie Eilish to your AUDICA song library.

name: Auto Rogue
summary: A roguelike where you automate combat. Combine skills and conditions to find your own optimal solution! No complicated controls at all!! Sit back with a coffee and watch the beautiful battles you've crafted unfold! Utilize a variety of skills, conditions, and relics to craft the ultimate build!

name: Auto-Crisis
summary: You're driving away on a forest road, late at night, under a heavy storm. Your car breaks down. Luckily, there might be a gas station nearby. But a misfortune never comes alone. The storm has brought something else, something otherworldly that oddly smells of spilled diesel oil.

name: Automobilista 2: Endurance Pack Pt2
summary: The follow-up to Pt1 released on New Year´s eve lof 2023, Pt2 further boosts the endurance car roster in AMS2 with one new LMDh / GTP, two LMP2 and two GT3 / GTD cars.

name: Aurora: A Child's Journey
summary: Aurora: A Child's Journey is a short and emotional game about the impacts of a huge environmental disaster through the eyes and feelings of a child.

name: Audica: Bex - "Avalanche"
summary: Add “Avalanche” by Bex to your AUDICA song library.

name: Audioshield
summary: Block the beats! Audioshield puts you at the point of impact for every hit in your songs. Block incoming orbs with your shields and feel the music. Works with any song file, plus online music streaming and Song of the Day.

name: Aurora: Genesis
summary: Uncover the secrets of the shattered realm in Aurora: Genesis, a roguelike action game. Traverse the dynamically changing landscape, battling creatures and exploring the realms. With masterful combat, endless replayability, and a rich lore to unravel, prepare for an immersive journey like no other.

name: Aualé
summary:
Aualé is a modern take on Oware —part of the Mancala family of games—, the traditional African strategy game renowned for its tactical depth. Blending classic gameplay with advanced artificial intelligence, it challenges players to outthink twelve unique AI opponents, each with unique personalities and evolving play styles.

Aualé delivers an authentic and deeply strategic experience. With an integrated coach —powered by the Aalina engine, one of the strongest Oware AIs out there—, hint system, global leaderboards, and analysis tools that help players learn and refine their skills over time. it offers both newcomers and seasoned players a clean, fast, and endlessly replayable test of strategy and skill.

name: Auto Modellista
summary: Handle the road like a pro with your own customizable racing machine or your choice of more than 60 top-of-the-line models. Race vehicles from manufacturers, including Toyota, Nissan, Honda, Subaru, and Mitsubishi, against up to eight drivers online or up to two drivers in split-screen mode. You'll tear past spectators, maneuver your way through tight mountain passes, and round each corner of the race track in your dream car at lightning speeds.

name: Aurora Defense
summary: A unique roguelike deckbuilder + base-building tower defense game. Build powerful defenses in the last bastion of light, fend off relentless waves of darkness, and protect the final goddess!

name: Autonomica
summary: Autonomica is an open-world survival game inspired by solarpunk aesthetics driven by farming and automation, exploration, and futuristic tech. Build automated farms, craft advanced machinery, and explore islands filled with mysteries, ghosts, challenges and time-bending adventures.

name: AuroraRL: Special Edition
summary:
Player takes control over a spaceship that was built with the cooperation all human nations. 
Anything, from artifacts of forgotten civilizations to new technologies, from unusual lifeforms to secret alien cookie recipes 
can help Earth overcome its political and energy crises.

name: Autofading Se Disparaître
summary: This work uses virtual reality and non-linear sound composition technologies to poetically explore the presence of human beings in their environment. Immersed in a forest generated by point cloud data, which evolves according to their observational attitude and type of attention they give to it.

name: AutoDemo Levels in SADX
summary: AutoDemo Levels in SADX is a modification that restores original level models and layouts from the AutoDemo version of Sonic Adventure developed by X-Hax.

name: Audiomech: Your Music Transformed
summary: Your music paints the world, and controls the action. Each of the Mech’s three forms [Bass Knight, Vocal Gunship, and Treble Bomber] react to any audio, including streaming.

name: Automachef
summary: Automachef is an indie puzzle game in which you will have to build automatic kitchens for a robotic fast food tycoon who believes he's a human.

name: Aum the Game
summary: AUM: The Game is an arena-based combat experience with deep RPG elements and unmatched customization. Master 5 fighting styles, harness elemental powers, and wield divine blessings to forge your destiny in a myth-inspired universe. Craft your unique avatar and conquer the arena!

name: Automon Arena
summary: Fast-paced monster catching auto-battler! Capture Automons in your trusty trash bags, build your team and battle other kids to be the last one standing!

name: Aurora Nights
summary: Aurora Nights is an entertaining educational game for learning to identify the constellations.

name: Audica: Ariana Grande - "Into You"
summary: Add "Into You" by Ariana Grande to your AUDICA song library.

name: Aurorae Equitas
summary: Slightly over-the-hill capybaras Rubina and Ceferino, a pair of old acquaintances, meet up at a rental cabin near the end of the year for the Aurorae Equitas, a recurring natural event that happens once every few decades. They quickly realize that no one else from their social group is showing up, they try to make the best of an awkward social situation and reminisce on their tangentially shared history while sharing a warm fire and a calming hot spring.

name: Autobahn Raser III
summary:
Autobahn Raser III is the third installment of Davilex' Autobahn Raser series.

Like in previous installments the player races through various German cities and on parts of the German Autobahn.
New to this game is the addition of the story character Krüger, a police agent chasing down the Autobahn Raser club.

name: Automatum
summary: Automatum is a 2D action and platform game with a dark pixel art style,in wich we take the role of an alien that must face a lot of adversities like platforming, combat and puzzles so he can regain his precious freedom.

name: Auto WWII Equips
summary: A World War II equipment-themed auto battler game. Build your squad and battle against asynchronous opponents. Contains Steam Workshop, allowing you to modify game rules and create custom units.

name: AutoChess of Gensokyo
summary: AutoChess of Gensokyo is a Touhou Project multi-player AutoChess-Like game. Draw character from the deck, build your combination, upgrade the character, and fight with other players.

name: AuroraBound Deluxe
summary: AuroraBound Deluxe is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game, where you link matching pieces together to discover beautiful hidden patterns.

name: Australian Football Coach 2019
summary: Coach your team to the premiership flag! Australian Football Coach is the premier Aussie Rules Football management game. Manage your players, tactics, and salary cap as you fight for glory!

name: Australian Trip
summary: Go on a bright and exciting adventure with the symbol of the New Year - the dog. A fascinating and extraordinary puzzle game in the sokoban genre. Your task is to manage the dingo dog - to move the opal stones, to blow up the boxes, to use the portals and the conveyor belts, and also the laser installations in order to reach the checkpoint.

name: Aura Kingdom: Impact
summary: Aura Kingdom: Impact is an anime-style fantasy MMORPG. Explore a vast world, fight with dynamic skills, and switch classes freely. Summon Eidolons to aid in battle.

name: Augury
summary: Fast paced gameplay with high difficulty, in-depth mechanics, and cooperative multiplayer. Action combat in confined dungeons with swarms of enemies, environmental hazards, and tough bosses.

name: Automatica
summary: Automatica is a 2D automation and management game inspired by titles like Factorio and Shapez, but with a twist on the traditional conveyor belt system. Connecting buildings is now as easy as dragging them inside each other

name: Auto Snakes in Outer Space
summary: A hypnotic incremental idler where you manage colorful snakes. Watch them collect food, then spend the food on upgrades and abilities for your colony.

name: Autumn Leaves
summary: A Dlc-sized Quest Mod with more than 2000 pro-voiced lines. Delve into a centuries-old library inhabited by sentient machines, and solve Hypatia's mysteries. Five different endings, unique O.S.T.

name: Audica: M-Cue - "U R Prey"
summary: Add “U R Prey” by M-Cue to your AUDICA song library.

name: Auction
summary: Auction is a 4 player co-op horror game where you must escape a mysterious building by finding keys left around. Solve puzzles, find keys and avoid the guards to reach the exit gate and break out...

name: Automobilista 2: IMSA Track Pack
summary:
The IMSA Track Pack adds 3 new North American Tracks from the 2024 Weathertech IMSA series to AMS2:
Canadian Tire Motorsport Park
Michelin Raceway Road Atlanta
Sebring International Raceway

name: Augmented Fear
summary:
Augmented Fear is a horror puzzle game set in a dark and oppressive cyberpunk universe.
Trapped in a mysterious district, you must find a way out and survive against aggressive creatures.
Use augmented reality to uncover the secrets hidden within.

name: Auxworld
summary: Auxworld is a platform where users can generate endless gaming adventures using AI prompts and must escape the dreamworld before it turns into a nightmare.

name: AutoParts Simulator
summary: AutoParts Simulator puts you in charge of an auto parts store, where every decision you make influences your success. Manage inventory, expand the product range in your warehouse, serve customers and grow your business. Conquer the automotive market with strategy and efficiency!

name: Audiosurf 2
summary: By blending gameplay with music visualization, Audiosurf puts you inside your music in a way nothing else can. Use your own music to create your own experience. The shape, the speed, and the mood of each ride is determined by the song you choose.

name: Aura: Echoes of Pain
summary: A beautiful narrative 2D puzzle platforming journey of self discovery. The world was bright and full of life, but is now dark and barren. Travel across a desolated land to find meaning through memories of a better time, when life was happier and uncover the secret that brought darkness to the land.

name: Australia Did It
summary: Join our mercenary team: high-risk, low-benefit positions available! Defend cargo trains in this innovative Turn-Based Tower Defense meets Reverse Bullet Hell. Deploy units, merge them to create powerful new types and variations, withstand relentless waves, deliver the goods.

name: Auro: A Monster-Bumping Adventure
summary:
Auro is a unique turn-based tactical dungeon-crawler all about bumping monsters into the water. Traverse randomly generated maps and create huge spell combos as you compete against rival Kingdoms and rise through the ranks. Auro is a different kind of game: no grinding, no IAPs, no chores -- just challenging tactical gameplay that forces you to think creatively to win.

In other words: Auro is all bump, no grind.

name: Autumn Waifu
summary: Autumn Waifu is a fun puzzle game with anime girls in an autumn theme! Collect 30 unique levels, enjoy the gallery of collected images and achieve goals with the achievement system. Colorful graphics and autumn atmosphere will give you an unforgettable experience!

name: Audio Trip
summary: Dance to your favorite music (and workout in “Cardio”) as you catch gems, ride ribbons, smash drums, & dodge barriers. With tracks by Zedd, Lady Gaga, Skrillex, deadmau5, Tiësto, express yourself & get creative with the in-VR editor--with support for your own songs!

name: Aurendor
summary: Aurendor is an open world survival game. Players must gather resources, cook their meals and fight dangerous creatures to survive and build a home for themselves. Aurendor also offers a multiplayer game option. Players can play together by cooperating with or battling other survivors.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator
summary: Autobahn Police Simulator is the first simulation to realistically reflect the working life of a police officer on the German Autobahn. In numerous and diverse operations the player is responsible for enforcing law and order on Europe’s fastest roads.

name: Automobilista 2: Adrenaline Pack Pt2
summary: Adrenaline Pt2 Introduces Super Trophy Trucks to Automobilista 2 - Big Trucks, jump ramps and big air time make up one of the most spectacular forms of motorsports in the world!

name: Autumn Break
summary: Autumn Break is a mod for OMORI that takes place three days before the recital.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3: Police Motorcycle
summary: Leave the windshield behind and feel the rush of the wind as you dive into high-speed pursuits or keep traffic under control with the brand new police motorcycle!

name: Autumn with the Shiba Inu
summary: Play as Quei-li the Labrador retriever and help her infiltrate the ARI - the Shiba Inu government - as an undercover hacker.

name: Automobili Lamborghini
summary: Automobili Lamborghini is one of the earlier racing games for the Nintendo 64, developed by Titus. 8 cars are included in this game, among them the Lamborghini Diablo, Porsche 959, Ferrari F50 and some hidden ones. The courses are quite detailed and the effects are decent, including special effects like lens flares. Races take you through six circuits in exotic areas around the world. There are 4 modes in Single Player including Arcade Mode, Championship Mode, Single Race and Time Trials. The game also includes 4 player support.

name: Aurora Heights
summary: Aurora Heights is a precision platformer and climbing game sprinkled with metroidvania. Help Hoshi, a fallen star, ascend back to the heavens. Unlock new abilities, collect keys, discover secrets, and explore mysterious landscapes where other stars have failed.

name: AutoForge
summary: In AutoForge you will build an expansive automated factory reaching up to the sky and deep into the ground, unlock and explore regions of a vast world filled with wonder and danger, upgrade yourself with ancient technologies, and then defend it all from the unfriendly denizens of the world.

name: Aura of Worlds
summary: Aura of Worlds is a chaotic, creative tactics rogue-lite platformer. Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you utilize creative abilities & wield the environment to your advantage. Blast, dash, grapple, fight, and charm your way through ever-changing labyrinths & outwit powerful guardians!

name: Aussie Clowns At War
summary: Aussie Clowns At War Dec 15, 2021 a free humorous fast paced multiplayer pc fps war shooter with some favored old school qualities like "COD MW2 kil streak announcer and Vietcong CTF" & 5 game modes 20 maps, awsome weapons classes including flame thrower, easy secure player hosting.

name: Aurora Nova
summary: Aurora Nova is a Roguelike deckbuilder with a hint of rpg elements. Instead of a fantasy world - like in the excellent Slay the Spire, Roguebook, Banners of Ruin, or Across the Obelisk (to name a few) - Aurora Nova is a scifi, story-driven journey that takes place in the distant future.

name: Autumn Dream
summary:
You've inherited a small house.
The documents say that you will only have a right to own it once you manage to live there for at least few days.
But you must not go outside at night and shouldn't open the cellar door.
Is there a chance to meet the conditions? Only time will show!

name: AutoHeroes
summary: AutoHeroes is a ‘one hero’ autobattler with elements of roguelike and the ability to play in multiplayer. Control one of the four heroes who fight each other for the throne on random maps - both as each for themselves and as part of teams. Study your enemies and counter them with your plan!

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3: Off-Road DLC
summary: Your shift in Autobahn Police Simulator 3 continues - with the new „Off-Road“ DLC!

name: Audica: Sleeping Lion & Cass Miller ft. Bugle Bot - "How We Know (Bugle Bot Remix)"
summary: Add “How We Know (Bugle Bot Remix)” by Sleeping Lion & Cass Miller ft. Bugle Bot to your AUDICA song library.

name: Austen Translation
summary: Austen Translation is a tongue-in-cheek strategy game which borrows heavily from the visual novel tradition. It can be played solo against bots or as a multi-player match with up to five players. Randomly combined plot elements, settings, endings and rivals make each playthrough feel fresh.

name: Aurelia: Stellar Arising
summary: Aurelia: Stellar Arising - 3D Turn-based Fleet vs. Fleet Space Combat Game. Choose between two factions and fight for control of the Aurelia System in over 77 missions per faction. Control fleets of up to 9 ships and give maneuver and tactical commands to each ship.

name: Au-Delà
summary: Au-Delà is an indie horror puzzle game where the main objective is to find your parents. For this purpose, you will have to explore the entire house, collect information and items, without dying, by solving puzzles or confronting monsters. Au-Delà takes the side of a 2D side view, offering a new experience by making you discover another way to appreciate the dark atmosphere of a horror game. It is especially intended for players who like to explore, solve mysteries and who are not afraid of monsters at night.

name: Autopsy Simulator
summary: Autopsy Simulator is a first-person horror-sim hybrid where players take on the role of a practice pathologist and study case files, created in collaboration with real-world forensic doctors, to help guide their dissection of anatomically accurate bodies to determine each subject’s cause of death.

name: Audio Forager
summary: Feel the magic of Machine Learning in this new experiment that combines over 44,000 sounds from Freesound.org, a data set created by Kyle McDonald and a touch of Cabbibo weirdness. Run your hands through a cloud of sound, select your favorite clips and make a drum set from this aural smorgasbord!

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3
summary: Autobahn Police Simulator 3 lets you play as a rookie officer who just resumed their position after a serious car accident left them incapacitated for a while. Work diligently and take on missions to become a capable police officer and keep the autobahn safe.

name: Aunt Fatima
summary:
Aunt Fatima is a horror game where you play the role of a kidnapped person by Aunt Fatima and her husband who found a way to escape from the house. Aunt Fatima and her husband kidnap people, force them to stream on the dark web, then kill them and sell their organs on the black market. You are the only one who managed to find a way to escape from the house.

To escape, you need to solve puzzles, collect items that will help you along the way, and find keys to unlock your way out. Aunt Fatima roams around the house, and if she sees you, she will chase you. Try to hide in cabinets to avoid her. Uncover the buried secrets of the house.

name: Auf Wiedersehen Monty
summary: Monty On the Run is a platform-style game featuring Monty Mole, a coal thief fleeing across Europe to escape the Intermole agency. Players navigate Monty through 80 screens representing European landmarks, using various movement techniques like super-leaps and ceiling suspension. The goal is to collect Eurocheques and plane tickets while avoiding hazards. The game incorporates unique elements such as drunkenness effects from wine bottles and aerial combat sequences. As the third main entry in the Monty Mole series, it builds upon the gameplay mechanics of its predecessors while introducing new challenges and environments.

name: Audiosurf
summary: Audiosurf is a puzzle/rhythm hybrid game created by Invisible Handlebar, a personal company created by Dylan Fitterer. It's track-like stages visually mimic the music the player chooses, while the player races across several lanes collecting colored blocks that appear in sync with the music. The music used in the game is chosen from the user's own library, from almost any DRM-free format, as well as standard redbook CDs; in addition, Audiosurf includes the entire soundtrack to The Orange Box as part of the download.

name: Automate It
summary: Automate It is a factory building game that requires clever solutions to its size, power, and time constraints. Solve challenges, build and share your own levels, or open things up in sandbox mode. If you want to build it - Automate It.

name: Audica: I Was Awake - "Pre-Existing Condition"
summary: Add "Pre-Existing Condition" - I Was Awake to your AUDICA song library.

name: Audica
summary: Audica is a VR Rhythm Shooter from Harmonix, the makers of Rock Band and Dance Central. Armed with a pair of rhythm blasters, you shoot and smash targets to the beat of a soundtrack that features songs from some of the world’s most popular artists. The better your timing and accuracy, the better your score. The better your score, the higher your place on Audica’s Leaderboards.

name: Auto Chess
summary: Auto Chess is the original auto battler game that had a significant worldwide influence with its brand new gameplay mode and strategic competitive features. It has also attracted tens of millions of players around the globe. Each player can play against others through the internet and enjoy a brand new strategy competitive experience.

name: Automobilista 2
summary: Automobilista 2 once again puts you in the driving seat of an advanced and diverse racing simulator - now with incredible graphical quality, high profile cars and tracks, advanced dynamic track condition system and VR support.

name: Auto-Land: Mechanical Horror
summary: Welcome to AUTO‑Land, an autonomous amusement center abandoned and transformed into a horrific death trap filled with robotic abominations. Armed with an arsenal of unorthodox weapons and gadgets, you must fight your way through this survival‑horror experience and escape AUTO‑Land in one piece.

name: Autonauts
summary: You are responsible for colonising uninhabited planets. Start from nothing and harness natural resources to build a robot empire that can be taught anything. Automation is the name of the game - progress through the technological ages, automate life itself and achieve absolute autonomy!

name: Auridia
summary: Explore an interconnected world full of platforming challenges in this short metroidvania. Unlock biomes by combining abilities you've learned, including climb, grapple, throw, and parry. Examine dozens of artifacts, commune with forgotten gods, and piece together what happened to Auridia.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 2
summary: Start your even more exciting career as law enforcer on Europe’s fastest road now with the successor to the popular Autobahn Police Simulator. For the first time in Autobahn Police Simulator 2 you can use the Character Creator to customize your own in-game character’s head, body and even clothing to your liking.

name: Auldhame
summary: Travel to find your home, in an odd, lonely world.

name: Australiove
summary: Is today the day you admit your love?

name: Aunt Flora's Mansion
summary: A puzzle game by Anna Anthropy.

name: Aura Kingdom 2: Evolution
summary:
《Aura Kingdom 2: Evolution》Unleash Legendary Eidolons, Evolve Your Adventure!
Dive into a vast world and immerse yourself in a new fantasy!
Experience the evolution of an anime fantasy adventure MMO in the massive world of《Aura Kingdom》, featuring 5 major upgraded systems. Embark on your heroic journey with stunning legendary Eidolons by your side!

name: Aunt Velma Is Coming to Tea
summary: A text adventure game for the ZX Spectrum.

name: Autophagy
summary: Autophagy.WAD is an old school megawad aiming for a mixture of Evilution, Scythe, Demonfear, and other classic experiences. Levels range from very easy to moderately challenging. This should be played in dsda-doom -complevel 2. 33 retro maps with fast and intense action!

name: Auro the Bunny
summary: Auro - The Bunny is a 2D platform game, in which the player will have to go through obstacles in order to catch all the fruits of the levels to win.

name: Autumn Wish
summary: Young witches Celia and Fen enjoy an evening full of magic and happiness together in town, but Celia finds herself wrestling with some complicated feelings and dangerous obstacles. Draw runes to cast spells, explore town, and be a gay mess of a witch in this narrative RPG visual novel!

name: Autumn and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy!

name: Aurium 2
summary: Second part of Crusader of Aurium .

name: Auti-Sim
summary: This game was developed during Hacking Health Vancouver 2013 hackathon. The player navigates through a playground as an autistic child with auditory hypersensitivity. Proximity to loud children causes sensory overload for the player, impacting cognitive functions. This impact is represented as visual noise and blur, as well as audio distortion. Participants described the experience as visceral, insightful and compelling.

name: Automatic War
summary: "Automatic War" is a cool auto battler. You are not in control of the battle process itself, but you can influence the outcome of the battle before the battle begins. Choose wisely and feel the excitement of fights!

name: Automatoys
summary: Insert coin. Dispense ball. Tap, turn, tilt and spin the contraptions to help each ball hop and roll its way to victory. Each Automatoy is a unique, mechanical obstacle course.

name: Autograv: Mini
summary:
If you're a fan of Autograv, you might enjoy this sneak preview into experimental design and in-progress features on their way to a larger release down the road.

"Autograv /mini/ is a minimalist space for me to experiment with upcoming Autograv features, and to map out end-to-end, high-level gameplay."

name: Automobilista 2: Historical Track Pack Pt1
summary: The Historical Track Pack Pt1 extends AMS2´s Historical selection with three legendary circuits: Cascais 1988, Jerez de la Frontera 1988 & Bathurst 1983.

name: Autopanic
summary: Autopanic is a minimalist twinstick shooter with rogue-like elements. Also a game about acknowledging player action.

name: Au Naturel
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by bitby as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Automata 10 Pack Volume 2
summary:
A collection of 10 games (on one cassette). The following games are included:
- Pi There!
- Xtroth - The Adventure
- Nth Zone
- Toilet Truble
- Paradise in Microdot
- The Egg
- Chambers of Death
- Nudgeit
- Pi in the Sky
- The Pimans Cocktail Cabinet

name: Audition Portable
summary: Audition Portable is a Korean PSP game by T3 Entertainment.

name: Autumn Leaves II
summary: Queer kids talking and cycling.

name: Autumn's Chorus
summary: Set out into the unexplored frontier land of Dorinth and make your name as a member of the Pilgrim's Guild in Autumn's Chorus; an action role playing game filled with interesting choices, exciting combat​, and memorable characters.

name: Automobilista 2: Racin' USA Pack Pt.2
summary: Part 2 of the Racin' USA Expansion Pack brings the glorious 1990s era of american single seater racing back to life, with cars from three different seasons and three classic road courses

name: Australian Road Trains
summary: Get ready to get into your truck and transport gigantic freight trains across the streets of Australia. Whether machines, wood or bulk material - with sufficient power you’ll make it to your destination.

name: Autumn-Chess
summary: The single player self-propelled chess game template and experimental works made by myself contain the basic elements of self-propelled chess game. However, due to the lack of funds, the monster setting and ending screen were not done.

name: Auto Defense
summary:
Insatiable alien swarms want to chow down on your castle! But your towers are ready to unleash the lightning, let loose the poison, set them ablaze with explosions, and much more.
Master the art of mixing and merging your turrets to unlock new strategies and send the invaders running! Create any combination of carnage you can imagine with limitless options.

name: AutoBulletSurvivor
summary: Jump into the world of AutoBulletSurvivor! Survive on a post-apocalyptic surface devastated by nuclear war. Collect items, evade powerful enemies, and gather supplies for the underground shelter. Grow stronger with each run and experience the thrill of survival.

name: AUTS: The Ultimate Stress Relief Game
Auto World Tycoon
summary: Auto World Tycoon is the next tycoon game from Diggidy.net. Based in real-time with full day night rotations as well as varying weather, players can purchase and own from over 30 different businesses.

name: Autogiro
summary: In Autogiro, a fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter, you take control of a sophisticated helicopter and set off on a mission where your survival depends on your accuracy, quick thinking, and strategy!

name: Austrian Avian Association

Auld Lang Syne: Cat and Mouse is a visual novel made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

It's a Granblue Fantasy fangame about two Zodiacs of many years in the past.

You don't need to know much about Granblue Fantasy, only that its setting is a world of floating islands with its own fantasy races, and that there's a group of characters inspired on the Chinese Zodiac/the Twelve Divine Generals.

With the exception of the minor NPCs and Dormouse, it's all original characters and story.

name: Audubon Whales: Wildlife Adventure
summary:
Audubon Whales: Wildlife Adventure is a series of educational games about whales.

Designed to teach young players about the lifecycle and types of whales and the dangers they face from hunting. The software package contains 4 short adventure games, as well as guides about whales..

In the first game, Whale Tracker, the player joins Bill Martinez on a whale watching expedition. The goal is to photograph whales from aboard the boat. The player reviews whale data cards on different types of whales, how and where they live, the sounds they make, and how to identify their spout. The player then goes on a subsequent trip, and must match photographs from the previous expedition to whales seen on the next trip.

In Secrets of Hosea Freeman you have moved into an old house formerly owned by by a whaler of New Bedford, Massachusetts. During the night, you see an image of an old man holding a coin and a piece of paper. You seek out to solve the mystery. The player explores the rooms of their large home, seeking clues left by Hosea Freeman. The player discover that Hosea had started out as a whaler, but had began to love and respect whales. He had even written a book about whales, which he had hidden somewhere within his home for the player to find.

In Whale Rescue the player again joins Bill Martinez in helping lost and stranded whales. This is a multiple choice game, where the player must correctly choose options from a whale rescue guide.

In Manatee Rescue, after working with Bill Martinez, the player is then hired to protect manatees off the coasts of Florida. The player answers calls at the Manatee Hotline at the Florida State Department of Fish and Wildlife. The player answers calls about dead or injured manatees, and must call the correct people to aid in the situation. The player can fly by helicopter to carious locations along the coast to speak to locals or aid in manatee rescues.

Since he is outnumbered, he mainly uses stealth to avoid his enemies or kill them unnoticed. Similar to Thief: The Dark Project, the player uses shadows and a light meter to his advantage. Light sources can't be extinguished.

When there is no way around the guards, the player also has the possibility to distract them with a coin or to kill them with one of his five weapons (e.g. throwing spear or sword). The fights are action oriented, the player can only stab or block. There are also switch puzzles to solve. The game features eleven missions with cutscenes taken from the movie.

The game incorporates 3D sceneries full of pedestrians and cross-traffic from multiple camera angles, including an overhead view.
