Levaria, the land protected by the spirits. 
Countries have fought with swords and magic for hundreds of years for their order and independence. 
 
A few years ago, the advent of the Dark Force brought further chaos to the world. 
Nations were perished overnight and many towns were invaded. 
Not only monsters getting wild in various places but also the ancient beast is about to awake by the dark power of death. 
 
To cope with the Dark Force, the alliance of the countries was inevitable. 
However, the common enemy was not enough to wash away the grudges from the past. 
 
The Galleria Kingdom proposed the founding of cooperative organization, and the conclusion of "Blood Oath". 
That is an ancient spell that cannot be discarded even by the destruction of the world. 
 
Thus, in the midst of the emergence of the Dark Force and the discord of the countries, 
a stateless organization- Sword of Aurcus was born. 
 
People start to gather to join the organization. 
And you are just one of them right now...

name: Austerlitz: Napoleon's Greatest Victory
summary: Get ready relive the DOS classic and to experience the Horror and Glory that was the battle of Austerlitz!

name: Aura Shift
summary: You're a chubby fairy and hordes of monsters are trying to eat you. In Aura Shift the psychedelic action never stops.

name: Automaton
summary: Lonely, a one-wheel worker robot begins a journey into the unknown.

name: AutoSim 2
summary: A text based motorsport management game where users challenge themselves to take their race team to the championship!

name: Autobahn Racing
summary: 1997 game

name: Au fil de l'eau
summary:
Au fil de l'eau is a short meditation game about kayaking and immersion in a beautiful landscape. Leave your apartment and go on an adventure.

I choose this subject because it's a good way to explore storytelling and visual art based on a simple gameplay.

name: Automata Empire
summary: Seize power and build an empire of fuzzy cellular automata monsters! Herd hundreds of mindless subjects to smash your rivals' castles and steal their territory in this RTS inspired by Conway's Game of Life.

name: Augmented Empire
summary: Augmented Empire is a story-driven tactical RPG set on the island of New Savannah, an isolated neo-noir city divided into three tiers by the ‘Citizen Grade System.’ While the citizens deemed of high societal value live in luxury at the summit, outliers and criminals are forced to live in squalor at the island’s depths.

name: Aurora: Weather Warfare
summary: An adventure game set in the near future in a world of cataclysmic climate changes. As one of the few lucky survivals, you’re about to embark on a full of peril, pitfalls, and difficult choices journey to the epicenter of the weather disaster to solve the mystery.

name: Augmented Future
summary: A sci-fi fantasy quicktime, text RPG. Explore, interact and fight your way to safety and answers. Do it all with implants in a lush fantasy world.

name: Auraboros
summary: Endless audio bullet hell game

name: Auto Museum 64
summary: A virtual car museum

name: Aurora Adventure: A Space Academy Tale
summary: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure! Before You is an exciting space saga about the adventures of the cadets of the Academy of the Interstellar Order.

name: Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator
summary: Are you ready to turn rusty old cars into gold and build the car dealership empire of your dreams?

name: Austin Powers Pinball
summary: Yeah Baby, Yeah! Find your Pinball Mojo with Austin Powers Pinball for Palm OS. All the shagadelic grooves of the International Man of Mystery accompany this addictive pinball game. Rack up the points against every challenge Dr. Evil can throw against you.

name: Auto Hustle
summary: Auto Hustle was a sandbox-style free roam game. They follow the adventures of a choosable unnamed Protagonist and their path to taking over the city.

name: Automation
summary: PLC Ladder Logic programming simulator.

name: Auto Island
summary: Completely open world. Just ride your cars, overcome mountain landscapes and forests. Find new cars.

name: AutoCube
summary: AutoCube is a creative sandbox where you can build anything you can imagine. In an infinite world you have all the space you could possibly need to build cute little houses or grand castles using features like copy and paste to speed up your progress.

name: Autosplit
summary:
Road Rage redefined - make Van Damme proud!
Enjoy a full throttle ride along busy streets and avoid obstacles by splitting your vehicle in two!
When we say splitting in two we mean it! Do the 'Auto-Split' and impress your clueless highway audience.
Sure, you'll produce some scrap metal but who cares? You'll look good while performing awesome stunts!
It's like starring in an action movie but only for the cool scenes. This is how you survive holiday traffic.

name: Auto Club Revolution
summary: Auto Club Revolution is a browser-based online racing game and car community. You'll be able to own, upgrade and customise officially licensed cars to create your ultimate online garage, then share them with friends, use them in multiplayer races or complete single player challenges.

name: Autonomy Lost
summary: Autonomy Lost is the sequel to HTC . Once again you play as the HECU grunt Jane Doe, set directly after the events of HTC.

name: Auditorium HD
summary: Auditorium is about the process of discovery and play.

name: Automon
summary: Fast-paced auto-battler. Fight, capture and upgrade Automons, build a diverse party, battle bad Bosses and become the Automon Champion!

name: Autocrash
summary: In Autocrash the player competes in a death tournament between "bumper cars". The goal is to dismount the opponent (or opponents) from his car, and hit him before he leaves the game zone. Along the stages, the enemy's A.I. difficulty level and his number will increase. Additionally, in some stages the enemies must be eliminated in a certain order.

name: Automatonics
summary: A little round robot is on a mission to save Earth. Lead your crew into exploring different planets in search of resources, killing enemy robots, collecting different power-ups and upgrading your powers, while solving the mysteries of these planets.

name: Aurora Hills: Chapter 1
summary: Aurora Hills: Chapter 1 is the first part in series of point and click puzzle adventure games. Follow the journey of Ethan Hill, a park ranger tasked with investigating strange disappearances from the region to uncover the mystery of Aurora Hills!

name: AutoRaid RPG manager
summary: AutoRaid: RPG Manager is a free-to-play digital strategy card game.

name: Autobots
summary: Clear levels by making robots smash into one another. You do this by manipulating them to crash into one another using your player icon (the robots always move towards your player, so if you can get two robots moving on the same lateral plane towards you then they are an easy kill.) When two robots crash into one another they form a pile of debris which can also be used to destroy robots.

name: Automobilista 2: Circuit des 24 Heures du Mans
summary: The mecca of Endurance racing arrives to AMS2! Modelled with the aid of detailed laser scan data this DLC features the modern 24h track along with its shorter Bugatti layout.

name: Augur & Haruspex
summary: WHAT ARE YOU WITHOUT A HEART?

name: Autumn-Time Trade-Up
summary: A game about speed, optimization, and exploration! Meet loads of unique characters on your way to the top of the spire! You are given four minutes to save Thanksgiving through various wacky means. Can you get everyone to the top of the Spire for the perfect Thanksgiving feast?

name: AutoMobile!
summary: Play this AutoMobile! game to find out how many automobile logos you recognized.

name: Aurora 4x
summary: A space based 4x game that has endless possibilities, open ended in terms of design.

name: Aurora: Puzzle Adventure
summary:
This minimalist puzzle adventure is set against a sublime skyscape. With over 200 handcrafted levels, relaxing gameplay and a diversity of mechanics: fire blocks, water obstacles, spinning cubes, spikes, and more. After a mysterious visitor threatens her peaceful universe, Aurora embarks on a dreamlike journey across five worlds in search of her friends.

Players interact with puzzles from five perspectives – a fresh twist to traditional Match-3 – pushing, popping, spinning and manipulating obstacles to reunite Aurora with her cats. This charming puzzler’s serene esthetics and beautiful atmospheric soundscape will appeal to fans of relaxing puzzle adventures.

name: Automobiles and the Eisenhower Hiway System the Game
summary: In this text based game the goal is to get to new york, but traversing the Eisenhower highway system can prove to be difficult.

name: Augie Doggie and Doggie Daddy
summary: C64 side scrolling platform game.

name: Autocrusher: Bumper Cars
summary: Auto Crusher: Bumper Cars is a car destruction racing game inspired by the bumper car rides from amusement arcades and carnivals. In this game players will feel the excitement of crashing into other vehicles, coupled with the use of several power ups and upgrades , making this game a race for glory!

name: Auto Cast
summary: Auto Cast combines elements from action rouge-lites, RPGs, and Shoot 'Em Ups into a 2D top-down world. Unlock new spells, level up existing ones, equip unique items, and find special events to maximize your chances of survival while cutting through hordes of enemies and bosses.

name: Aurora
summary: This is a light puzzle game of pretty girls, so help the girls solve their problems! Then you can interact with the pretty girls.

name: Automan
summary: Based on the 80s TV series of the same name.

name: Aussie Rules Footy
summary: Aussie Rules Footy was developed by Beam Software as the first Australian Football League simulation game for the NES. It was exclusively released in Australia, and was never released anywhere else in the world. The game allowed for one player and two player in versus.

name: Aurorae
summary: Aurorae adopts the art form of combination of anime drawing and cartoon characters. The game adopts a horizontal combat mode, combined with a very rich and diverse character skill design.

name: Autopista
summary: Autopista is a car racing game inspired by 80s toys.

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Horny Madness
summary: In the wastelands of Pentarull there is a town "El Drakio", under the control of Sevilla. Strange things are happening - people are horny! What is going on in the town, and is Sevilla involved? The hero will set out to investigate the strange phenomena of the HORNY MADNESS!

name: Automation
summary: Winner of the first OROW competition, this game was created in 1 week and is set in 1 room. A scientist looses his robot down a hole in the floor and must get it back using the environment around him.

name: Aurora Dusk: Steam Age
summary: An amazing mix of RPG, strategy, simulation, sandbox and survival game. Aurora Dusk looks like many other games, but instead of being alone, you live in a community. You can play one or more villagers and evolve from the Wood Age to the Steam Age.

name: Augury Point
summary: Murder Mystery meets Dating Sim in a small southwestern town beset by cults & conspiracies. Can you prevent your coffee shop from closing, solve your uncle’s murder and maybe even find love?

name: Autobahn Tokio
summary: Autobahn Tokio is a racing game released only in Japan for the 3DO. Players can select from four unnamed cars with different characteristics, loosely based on real car models. Three tracks are available - a city at night, a coastal highway, and a forest track. Players race against one CPU opponent, while trying to hit checkpoints in the quickest time possible. Both automatic and manual transmissions are available for each car. Cars cannot be tuned, and there is no two-player option. Despite being released only in Japan, all menus and game text is in English.

name: Auto Kingdom Crunch
summary: Pick the best team, level up your units and battle other players in this relaxed auto-battler. Can you get 10 wins?

name: Audsdg
summary: A First Person Social Deduction Game.

name: Auto Auto: Maximum Autodrive In The Alien Apocalypse
summary: Oh no! Aliens have taken over! All of humanity is a hive mind with one goal... to destroy the last person standing! Drive, drift, and shoot your way through the onslaught before the aliens decide to deal with their little problem themselves. How long will your spirit keep the last person alive?

name: Augustland Barrens
summary: Augustland Barrens is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Auto Chess Legends
summary: Auto Chess Legends is a strategy game mixed with chess, that emphasizes fast and fluid gameplay: Auto fight across an 8x8 field chessboard using heroes as your game pieces. How you play your pieces matters, far more than how fast you can tap!

name: Auryn Quest
summary: Auryn Quest is a "jump and run" adventure game based on Michael Ende's novel The Neverending Story and his film adaptation of the same name.

name: Autocraft
summary: Create, Collect, and Crash in Autocraft, a physics destruction puzzle/sandbox from the creators of Apotheon and Capsized.

name: August 31
summary: August 31 is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Huá Jū. It plays like most Yume Nikki fangames, except that there are some events that have dialogue with other characters and it has little to no music.

name: Automata
summary: Massive mutant creatures are coming at you, control your automata to beat them!

name: AuraVale
summary: AuraVale is a cozy life-sim where your words shape your story. Create your Aura, design your perfect home, and build lasting relationships. Develop a thriving town and invite friends to be your neighbors.

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Revenge of the Fox Spirit
summary: Strange disappearances of men have begun in the steampunk town of KongGong, so cat detective Miyu is sent there for investigation. Here, in this unusual place, technology has begun to supplant magic, but one ancient spirit clearly doesn't like it...

name: Aura Battler Dunbine: Byston Well's Flame
AutoBrawl: One World, One Winner
summary: AutoBrawl : Strategically bid for unique vehicles, battle in a 100-player showdown on diverse terrains, and climb global leaderboards. With realistic graphics and frequent updates, stake your claim as the ultimate car collector and battle royale champ. Ready for the automotive apocalypse?

name: Aura's Room
summary: A bitsy game about a girl in her room.

name: Aurora Hex: Pattern Puzzles
summary: Aurora Hex - Pattern Puzzles is a relaxing and peaceful puzzle game, where you link matching pieces together to discover beautiful hidden patterns.

name: Automobilista 2: Formula HiTech
summary: Formula HiTech features some of the most technologically advanced cars in the history of Grand Prix Racing. The cars are split in two classes from two distinct generations, each headlined by officially licensed Mclaren Racing cars.

name: Automobilista 2: Historical Track Pack Pt2
summary: The Historical Track Pack Pt2 extends AMS2's Historical selection with four new versions of legendary circuits: Barcelona 1991, Montreal 1991 & Interlagos 1991 / 1993.

name: Auto_Battler_RPG
summary: This is a game about automatical upgrades and unlocking of resources The game plays by itself while all you do is upgrade your hero... and attempt to move even further in the dungeon and by doing that growing in strength.

name: Auto Racing
summary: Auto Racing is a one or two player racing game that puts the player behind the wheel of one of five cars, each with different specialties. The player may race on five different fairly large courses. In the one player game, the player is racing the clock to finish five laps as quickly as possible. In the two player game, the player can race a friend and gain points for either the opponent crashing or if one is leading far enough to reach the edge of the screen.

name: Audition 2
summary: Audition 2 was a sequel to a free-to-play dancing MMO Audition Online, developed by T3 Entertainment. Its servers were shut down on 2014-04-16.

name: Australian Rugby League
summary: Australian Rugby League is a 1995 rugby game by Electronic Arts for the Sega Mega Drive released exclusively in Australia and Europe.

name: Auraru to Hikari no Ryuu: Gathering Light
summary: Auraru and the Dragon of Light: Gathering Light is a Japanese RPG where monster girls and supernatural beings journey together through a fantasy realm. The story follows their quest as they engage in side-view turn-based battles, with each character bringing their distinct abilities to the party as the tale of light unfolds.

name: Autograv
summary: Autograv is a miniature digital world for fans of high speed anti gravity vehicles, 90s japanese highway battles, and drone racing. It's also for people who like gazing out the window at traffic for hours while sitting in the backseat.

name: Autonima
summary: Ohm, a recordkeeper from the great library, has been sent to the Crescent Mountains to uncover the origin of life. It has been 100 years since the Last Advent and now the metal bodies of the Autons are failing. They must find the Makers before their civilization disappears.

name: Aura Battler Dunbine: Seisenshi Densetsu
summary: Dunbine is a strategy RPG based on the anime of the same name.

name: Augurium Mortis
summary: A distant world in a dystopian future, separated from her squad Amy Sol finds herself being ambushed by enemy forces looking for revenge. Pilot her nimble hovercraft to blow up as many mechs as possible in this fast-paced arena top-down shooter.

name: Autogun Heroes
summary:
Warm up your fingers, because this game will demand the best from you.
Take back the control of an alien-infested world in this next-gen, non-stop 3D action platformer with overloaded guns, a team of heroes and blast those back where they came from!

name: Autobahn Raser: Das Spiel zum Film
summary: Autobahn Raser: Das Spiel zum Film is the game based on the movie Autobahn Raser which is based on the Autobahn Raser game series. Like usual the player races through courses based on real German cities, this time Munich, Berlin, Hamburg and Cologne. There are four playing modes: racing against opponents, racing against the clock, police chases and a campaign which has nothing to do with the movie. The difference to the regular races is that the player sometimes has to ram stolen car dealers off the road.The connection to the movie are film sequences, biographies of the actors, the original soundtrack and similar cars.

name: Austin Powers: Welcome to My Underground Lair!
summary: Fans of AUSTIN POWERS will find a lot to do in AUSTIN POWERS: Welcome to My Underground Lair. This game turns your Game Boy Color into a mini-organizer, complete with a word processor (the Evil Launch Pad), a calculator (the Frickulator), and a mockup web browser that contains facts about the popular movies. Looking for something a bit more game-related? Well, AUSTIN POWERS has those in spades, too. The largest of the games, "Kin-Evil," has Dr. Evil and Mini-Me riding their scooter through a variety of stunt-packed stages. Also available for your enjoyment are the "Mojo Maze," a takeoff on PAC-MAN, "Domination," a board game similar to OTHELLO, and finally "Rock or Paper or Scissors," which pits you against an AUSTIN POWERS character in a play of the classic game. Customize the backdrop of all this fun by choosing wallpaper, screensavers, sound effects, and more. You can also link up to play some of the games with a friend or foe using either AUSTIN POWERS: Oh Behave! or AUSTIN POWERS: Welcome to My Underground Lair.

name: Aura: Fate of the Ages
summary: 'In the hallways of the ancients, the Keepers have existed forever.' The legend also claims that whoever unites these rings with the artifacts of the parallel worlds will achieve great power and immortality.

name: Australian Games
summary: A sports-based minigame collection centered around Australian stereotypes.

name: Augmented Brutality
summary: Augmented Brutality is a lightning fast, hyperviolent top-down shooter in a nightmarish techno-industrial setting. Shoot, dismember, head-stomp and door-kick your way through dozens of handcrafted levels using any edge you can find to tilt the impossible odds to your favor. It's time to get bloody.

name: Automaton Arena
summary: Cute Bots That Probably Shouldn't Be Fighting!

name: Aurans
summary: Aurans is a kinetic visual novel, meaning it is linear and with no choices. It is a story about coming of age, learning to believe in yourself, and finding out what really matters to you. Everything is fully hand drawn, and is the first visual novel project of Pixelsplosion Studios.

name: Autochef
summary: Sim of a catering business.

name: Aurora Chronicles
summary: Aurora Chronicles is a 2D side-scrolling survival action game where you play as a Demon Rogue Bounty Hunter named Aurora, you must survive against waves of enemies who are out to destroy and kill you, utilize your rogue skillset to see how long you can survive in the world of Orellia

name: Author Clicker
summary: Select images and text from randomly provided content to create your own story or visual novel! No typing!

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - The Dark Sea DLC
summary: Long ago, the elves of the Dark Forest promised to protect the sea kingdom of Aquantis from the depth's evil creatures. Though, a war with the Demon Queen prevented them from doing so. And many inhabitants of Pentarull know how vengeful the depth's creatures can be...

name: Aurascope
summary: Aurascope is a 2D action-adventure collectathon platformer with light puzzle and RPG elements. Join our friends Trace and Aurora to uncover the secrets surrounding the Aurascope, a mysterious drive from beyond the stars!

name: Auto Pirates: Captains Cup
summary:
Competitive daily pirate auto-battler. Choose your crew and compete globally.
Auto Pirates is a competitive player vs world strategy game where you choose your crew, equip your ship and battle, earning loot based on your global rank. There is no pay-to-win or grind-to-win, new players can challenge for the top if their strategies are good enough.

name: Aurora: El Destino de los Mundos
Auto-Upturn
summary: Auto-Upturn is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Sachen, which was released in Asia in 1991.

name: AUX B
summary:
At the B-Sides Music Festival in Lucerne, Switzerland tons of audio equipment is connected with cables. If only one of these cables is not plugged in correctly, the loudspeakers remain silent. 
 
In AUX B you are tasked with connecting the right cables. Bring the music through the different components to the loudspeaker to make it to the next level. If you complete all 80 levels until 15 May 2015, you have the chance of winning 1 of 3 festival tickets for the B-Sides Music Festival.

name: Auditorium Duet
summary: Auditorium Duet, from CipherPrime, is the upcoming sequel to the PC/PS3 game Auditorium, a music-focused puzzle game. Funded through Kickstarter, Auditorium Duet will release eventually for PC/Mac, prominently featuring co-operative play.

name: Audio Factory
summary: Audio Factory is a VR experience (Daydream port) showcasing spatial audio capabilities of the Resonance Audio SDK by Google. Explore each floor to experience how spatial audio contributes to the VR immersion. Requires: headphones (Bluetooth not supported) and Vive/Oculus Touch controllers.

name: Aunt Emily
summary: Your aunt, Emily, just died. Being her only relative alive, her house in the small town of Broken Falls now belongs to you. But there's a catch: her ghost still lives within the house and will not leave for the afterlife until the mystery of her death is resolved. With help from FBI agent Desmond Miles, it's up to you to find out what happened to your aunt.

name: Auralux
summary: Auralux is an abstract, essentialized, and simplified real-time strategy game.You command only one type of unit and have only one type of order to give those units. You and your opponents start the game with precisely equal resources. Quick reflexes will get you nowhere. The only path to victory is through clever strategy. Auralux features a slow, floating feel and vibrant minimalistic graphics. The entire game pulses to the rhythm of ambient music, and the player's actions evoke sounds that smoothly coalesce into melody. This game is designed to provide a relaxing, cerebral experience. Every choice matters, and only the best strategies will succeed.

name: Auver
summary: Suzanne Auver was a successful painter once, until her sister went missing. Blaming herself, she was persistent on finding her. But with frequent nightmares involving the disappearance of her sister, this wasn't an easy task.

name: Autogame Deluxe
summary: A one button party game where you battle to win rounds by being the last car driving on increasingly chaotic crossroads!

name: Auri's Tales
summary: Join Auri in a 3D adventure to meet the King and the Queen of Solea: jump, explore, solve puzzles and help friendly characters to open the doors of the castle!

name: Autocraft
summary: Autocraft is a game where you will be playing as a mighty Dwarf that can collect loot.. as well as enchant his shield with bonus gems found around.

name: Ausbruch
summary:
Everyone has a reason to come home early.

Help this poor fool get out of prison!
In this long-cherished interpretation of the classic, I let the ball wander through 60 hand-picked rooms.

name: AudioBeats
summary: Audio beats is a tribute to the classic VR rhythm game，serve the core player for music game types．If you are traditional rhythm game users who seeking for hit experience and difficulty，this game will be perfect for you.

name: Auto Immune
summary: A virus is attacking your cells, and its up to you to defend them! Buy and combine cells to assemble your immune response. Discover powerful synergies to overcome a constantly evolving enemy in this physics-based auto battler. Outlast your opponents or work together to achieve immunity.

name: Auf Abwegen
summary: Explore the beauty and dangers of nature in this narrative mini-puzzle-platformer - a one-man project from Kindman. Slip into the role of a red fox in its natural habitat - feed your family and survive the threats of the forest - and humans too!
